Template.name: database.logicunit.history.sqlTable
Template.Source:
CREATE TABLE <jt:item source='$dataset.data_name' format='field'/>_HS ( OUHD INTEGER NOT NULL, OUHD_ACTION CHAR(1), OUHD_DATE DATE, <jt:loop source='$fields' alias='field'> <jt:item source='$field.data_name' format='field' rpad='20'/> <jt:item source='$field.data_type'/><jt:notEquals source='$field.is_null' value='Y'> NOT NULL</jt:notEquals><jt:position type='last' source='$field' elseValue=','/> </jt:loop> )<jt:equals source='$dataset.config' value='logic'> TABLESPACE EUISHS</jt:equals>;
ALTER TABLE <jt:item source='$dataset.data_name' format='field'/>_HS ADD CONSTRAINT <jt:empty source='$dataset.data_alias' value='$dataset.data_name' elseValue='$dataset.data_alias' format='Upper'/>_HK PRIMARY KEY ( OUHD )<jt:equals source='$dataset.config' value='logic'> USING INDEX TABLESPACE EUISHS</jt:equals>; <jt:loop source='$fields' alias='field' filter='$field.is_unique=Y'>
